title: 2.The Art Of Sweeping Things Under The Rug - Scenes from a Marriage

sources.description: TV Mini Series: Scener ur ett Ã¤ktenskap Marianne tries to back out of a Sunday dinner with her parents but fails and realizes how difficult it is for her to defeat other people's expectations. Johan mildly flirts with a colleague at work who carefully yet demeaningly criticizes his poetry. Marianne and Johan discusses their sex life, and we learn that Marrianne has become uniterested in physical intimacy.
